data.title: Christopher Knight Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Christopher Knight on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Christopher Knight including Nowhere, Book Of The Dead, and more.
data.text:
We Will Rock You

Hyde throws a bonfire to burn disco records, Jackie tries to get closer to Fez, Donna learns Randy has dated a lot in the past, and Kitty and Red meet their new neighbors.

Malice in Wonderland

When the CSI team is called in to investigate a robbery-homicide at an "Alice In Wonderland" themed wedding, they have little to work with to find a killer. Meanwhile, Hodges' mother comes to town, and he wants her to believe Morgan is his girlfriend. Jaclyn Smith guest stars as Olivia Hodges. (TV-14)

Family Crisis

Jon worries when his nephew falls in with a gang of unruly teenagers who joyride in stolen automobiles. And two jewelry thieves use a movie stunt car for their getaways, but the car is rigged to shoot off smoke, oil and fire. Danny Bonaduce guest stars.

Tracey Gold, Natalya Neidhart, Michael Sam & Christopher Knight

A tragically murdered child reaches out from the grave via Tyler to reconnect with Tracey Gold. WWE Diva Natalya Neidhart's tough exterior is shattered when Tyler makes a heartbreaking connection to lost loved ones within her family. Michael Sam receives unexpected insight from Tyler about his long lost brother. Christopher Knight has an emotionally charged awakening when Tyler connects him to two deceased fathers.
